amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), add the following: SEC.__. Not later than 60 days after the date of the enactment of this Act ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require the Secretary of Commerce, the United States Trade Representative, and United States International Trade Commission to jointly submit a report to Congress detailing their respective authorities to impose sanctions against corporations or other legal entities that benefit from utilizing trade secrets or other information.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Doyle amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A052) offered by Mr. Doyle.
